snippet: A strengthening labor market helped existing-home sales grow 2 percent to an annual rate of 5.59 million units,
abstract: Solid labor market activity appears to have ignited sales of existing homes; graphs show existing home sales and home prices in 2014 and 2015.
lead_paragraph: A strengthening labor market helped existing-home sales grow 2 percent to an annual rate of 5.59 million units,

headline.main: Existing-Home Sales Grow to Highest Pace Since 2007
headline.print_headline: Sales of Existing Homes Hit Pace Last Seen in 2007
